sentence_text: ( Camera close up of a tumbler . )
( Someone drops three ice cubes and pours the rest of the vodka from the bottle into the glass . )
( He picks up the glass and walks around the room . )
( He sits on the bed and drinks from his glass . )
( He stands up and walks into the bathroom to stand in front of the foggy mirror . )
( He uses the back of his hand to wipe it clear . )
( He stares at himself and sighs . )
( GRISSOM turns the corner to the hotel hallway and makes his way to the officer who stands just outside the hotel room door . )
( The OFFICER signals GRISSOM inside the room . )
( BRASS is inside with two other OFFICERS . )
[[Brass]] oh ... you 're going to love this
( BRASS pulls out a cloth from his pocket to open the bathroom door . )
( At the far end of the bathroom , is a tub ... with the dead body inside . )
[[Brass]] rub-a-dub-dub , dead man in a tub
( BRASS and GRISSOM step into the bathroom . )
( GRISSOM puts his kit down near the door . )
[[Brass]] open window so the stench alerts the neighbors
[[Grissom]] it 's royce harmon all over again
( Quick flashes of : A shot of the chest bullet wound . )
( Flash to : The revolver in the man 's left hand . )
( GRISSOM cautiously look , reaches out and finds the tape recorder clutched in the body 's right hand . )
( He takes it and looks at it . )
[[Recorded_Voice]] ... narl loop sair momoph reet reet seer pute narfenging
[[Brass]] what kind of language is that ?
( GRISSOM thinks about it for a moment , then turns around to look at BRASS . )
[[Grissom]] would you excuse me a minute ?
( BRASS steps out of the bathroom and closes the door behind him . )
[[Brass]] we had a case like this three months ago -- a guy found dead in his bathtub
[[Brass]] turned out the suicide was staged
[[Brass]] found a mini-recorder as a suicide note
( BRASS turns to look at the closed bathroom doors . )
[[Officer_Arvington]] why does he want to be alone ?
[[Brass]] he wants to get his mojo working
( GRISSOM turns the tape recorder on and plays it backward , then flips the switch to play it forward . )
[[Recorded_Voice]] man on mini-recorder : my name is stuart rampler
[[Recorded_Voice]] i reside at 818 noeing hill court , las vegas , nevada
[[Recorded_Voice]] i am 43 years of age , and i 'm going to kill myself
[[Recorded_Voice]] i just ca n't do it anymore
( He shuts the recorder off and stands there a moment . )
( He turns to look at his reflection in the mirror . )
( GRISSOM walks into the hallway reading the assignment sheets in one hand ; the bagged tape recorder in the other . )
( He looks up and sees SHIBLEY walking toward him . )
[[Grissom]] shibley , take this recorder to the print lab
( GRISSOM hands the tape recorder to SHIBLEY , then continues down the hallway . )
[[Grissom]] have manny dust it and run prints on it right away
( SHIBLEY gives GRISSOM a large envelope . )
[[Shibley]] put a 'rush ' on them for you
( GRISSOM walks down the hallway and stops when he hears what sounds like a football game whistle coming from the break room . )
( WARRICK and NICK play a video football game . )
( GRISSOM walks into the break room . )
[[Grissom]] you guys want an assignment slip or a pink slip ?
( WARRICK stands up ; NICK shuts the game off and also stands up . )
[[Warrick]] just taking a little coffee break
[[Grissom]] reckless driver out at hoover dam
( GRISSOM gives WARRICK the assignment sheet . )
[[Warrick]] oh , me and him , working together ?
( WARRICK hands the sheet to NICK . )
( The two gearing up for the challenge ahead . )
( Once his back is turned , NICK and WARRICK look at each other and smile ... gearing up for the challenge ahead . )
[[Grissom]] okay , we 're going off the board tonight
( GRISSOM stands in front of the large fish-shaped corkboard and takes down some photographs . )
[[Grissom]] about three months ago , brass and i found this guy dead in his own bathtub , but his 'suicide ' was staged
[[Grissom]] i think the killer has killed again
( He hands the photos to SARA . )
[[Grissom]] photos of tonight 's victim : stuart rampler
[[Grissom]] play the 'pick six things that are different ' game
[[Catherine]] print examiner lifted a thumbprint off the mini-recorder near the tub of our first victim
( CATHERINE looks around GRISSOM 'S office and finds the fake hand . )
[[Grissom]] the killer purchased one of these rubber hands laced the fingertips with cooking spray and proceeded to place false prints all around the crime scene
[[Grissom]] some guy who works in a warehouse making halloween paraphernalia
[[Grissom]] scary masks , air-brushed tombstones , rubber hands
[[Grissom]] turns out he used his own hand for the mold
[[Grissom]] you and i go to the coroner
[[Grissom]] sara , you go to the hotel
[[Grissom]] dust every inch of that bathroom
( GRISSOM reaches for a container on the shelf . )
[[Grissom]] well , serious case , serious print powder
[[Grissom]] do n't take anything for granted
( CATHERINE and GRISSOM also leave the office . )
( NICK and WARRICK enter the crash site . )
( Emergency crew work on the car . )
[[Warrick]] everyone still breathing in that car ?
[[Nick]] you see who could have made it ?
[[Paramedic]] we were first on the scene
[[Paramedic]] fire department came in two minutes behind
( The fire department crew cut the top off of the car . )
( They start working on the unconscious man in the back seat of the car . )
( NICK and WARRICK look up above where the car fell . )
( NICK looks around on the ground and finds something . )
( NICK uses a pen and picks it up to look at it . )
[[Warrick]] how you know it 's from the car ?
( DR. ROBBINS pulls the body out of storage . )
( He goes over the body with GRISSOM and CATHERINE . )
[[Dr._Albert_Robbins]] i 've read klausbach 's report on royce harmon the first staged suicide
[[Dr._Albert_Robbins]] well , based on the entry wound , they were both murdered
[[Dr._Albert_Robbins]] but here 's where it gets fun
( DR. ROBBINS shows them the wound on the back of STUART RAMPLER 'S left hand . )
[[Catherine]] that looks like he was shot trying to protect himself
[[Dr._Albert_Robbins]] he was paid a little visit from mr muzzle stamp
( DR. ROBBINS shows them the bruise on the temple . )
( Quick flashback to : The gun is against STUART RAMPLER 'S temple . )
[[Catherine]] forced into the tub at gunpoint ?
[[Grissom]] the killer 's got him at gunpoint , right ?
( Quick flashback to : STUART RAMPLER puts his hand up to block the gunshot . )
( Quick CGI that follows the bullet as it pierces through flesh . )
[[Grissom]] but this time , things got messy
[[Grissom]] royce harmon did n't fight back
[[Grissom]] that 's why there was no muzzle bruising to his temple
[[Catherine]] he did n't want to get into that tub too easily
[[Catherine]] he took a few jabs to the temple
[[Grissom]] but the killer just lost round one
[[Grissom]] we know how he gets his vics into the tub and we know that both deaths were homicides
( WARRICK stands at the top of the overlook near the broken railing . )
( NICK measures the tire marks on the road . )
[[Nick]] the skid start way up the road
[[Nick]] i got him doing at least 70
[[Nick]] these grooves are from the car 's frame
( NICK looks a the shoe prints in the dirt . )
[[Nick]] wide spacing , slipping of the heel

( The car heads straight for the truck . )
( The car crashes through the railing and teeters on the edge of the embankment , its engine still running . )
( The Drunk Backseat Passenger , WALTER BANGLOR , stays in the car as it topples over and off the cliff . )
( WALTER BANGLOR screams as the car falls down the ravine . )
[[Warrick]] so your drunk driver just got out and ran away ?
( NICK looks at WARRICK and nods . )
[[Nick]] but he left his buddy hanging out to dry
( WARRICK points to the tire marks on the roadway behind NICK . )
[[Warrick]] then how do you explain car number two ?
[[Nick]] driver ran to this point , car picks him up
[[Nick]] here are your tracks ... probably took him to the hospital
( WARRICK looks down at the tracks in the dirt . )
[[Warrick]] they 're kind of out of place
[[Warrick]] a walking stride up to the edge
( WARRICK takes a couple of photos . )
[[Warrick]] this is a crime , not an accident
[[Nick]] you care to back that statement up ?
[[Nick]] my phantom driver against your criminal ?
[[Warrick]] i do n't get out of bed for less than a bill
( NICK laughs and they shake on it . )
( SARA walks into the hotel room bathroom carrying her kit . )
( She meets up with DET B. EVANS . )
( SARA puts her kit and things down . )
[[Det._Evans]] lives in town reserved a room for one night because his house was being fumigated
[[Det._Evans]] i bagged a couple of utility bills
( He moves to the side and picks up a bag of bills and shows it to SARA . )
[[Det._Evans]] it 's almost as if he wanted to take care of some unfinished business before he checked out
( SARA takes the mail out of the bag and goes through the bills . )
( SARA uses the Red Creeper on the bathroom pipes . )
[[Sara]] i love bathrooms last time i printed a hotel bathroom , i had over 1,000 prints
( SARA continues to dust the tub . )
[[Sara]] okay ... close the doors and hit the lights , daddy-o
( EVANS closes the bathroom doors and turns the lights off . )
( SARA uses her ALS and ca n't believe her findings . )
[[Sara]] not only did he wipe it clean -- it 's sterile
( GRISSOM and CATHERINE interview PAIGE HARMON . )
[[Paige_Harmon]] i thought you were going to tell me that you caught him
[[Grissom]] mrs harmon , we believe that the person who did this to your son may have done it to someone else and we need your help
[[Catherine]] we talked to the second victim 's girlfriend -- played his suicide recording for her
[[Catherine]] she confirmed that it was his voice
[[Paige_Harmon]] but i already told you that the voice on that tape was not my son 's
[[Catherine]] we just need to be absolutely certain do you have a recording of your son 's voice so that we could tie the killings together ?
[[Grissom]] anything , mrs harmon -- a home movie ?
[[Grissom]] a recorded message off your answering machine ?
( She stands up and picks up a picture frame . )
[[Paige_Harmon]] royce gave this to me for mother 's day last year
[[Royce_Harmon]] i know you 're always complaining you do n't hear my voice in the house anymore
[[Royce_Harmon]] well , now you can listen to it anytime you want
( WARRICK and NICK walk with DR. LEEVER down the hospital hallway . )
[[Nick]] mr backseat going to make it ?
[[Nick]] all right , all right , i get the picture
[[Nick]] how long until we can see him ?
[[Dr._Leever]] i did n't say you could n't see him
( DR. LEEVER turns and leads NICK and WARRICK into the hospital room . )
[[Dr._Leever]] if you want to talk to him you 're going to have to wait until he comes off his meds in about 12 to 24 hours
[[Warrick]] tan lines , no watch and no ring
( WARRICK picks up the envelope and checks its contents . )
( He spills it out onto the table . )

( WARRICK shows NICK the empty wallet . )
[[Warrick]] do you want to up the stakes another hundred ?
( DR. LEEVER looks over at NICK . )
[[Warrick]] say my foul play against your phantom driver ?
( They seal the deal with a hand 'shake ' . )
( DR. LEEVER watches and shakes his head , a half-smile on his face . )
[[Greg_Sanders]] i 've got stuart rampler 's dna profile ready
[[Greg_Sanders]] all i need is something to compare it to
[[Sara]] let 's see if we can find out who this licker is
( SARA hands the sample vial to GREG . )
( He puts it in the machine and switches it on . )
( Short time cut later : The results print out . )

[[Warrick]] pd 's putting a name to it
[[Nick]] car was rented from the airport three days ago

[[Nick]] there was only a change of clothes in the damn suitcase

[[Grissom]] i 'm sure you do it well
